name: Ego Protocol (itch)
description:
Ego Protocol - a game where you control stage by moving tiles to create a safe passage for the lemming-like character

Ego Protocol is an action puzzle platform game, where the Player controls the surroundings in order to escort the main character to an exit, avoiding dangers and obstacles. Ego Protocol requires quick reflex and even quicker thinking to meet the above average difficulty level.

Features:

  • 45 levels that will bend your mind
  • 4 unique stage mechanics that will twist your soul
  • Enemy robots, sentry guns, mines, trap doors and many different obstacles that will make you scream in panic
  • Lots of fun!
